SEARCH
Package com.pablovilan.usermanagement.model.services

Interface RoleService

public interface RoleService
Service interface for managing roles in the system. This interface defines methods for creating, deleting, finding roles, and assigning/removing roles to/from users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    assignRoleToUser(String username, String role)
    Assigns a role to a user.
    boolean
    createRole(String name, String description)
    Creates a new role with the specified name.
    boolean
    deleteRole(String name)
    Deletes a role by its name.
    Role
    findRoleByName(String name)
    Finds a role by its name.
    Boolean
    removeRoleFromUser(String username, String role)
    Removes a role from a user.

  • Method Details

    • createRole

      boolean createRole(String name, String description)
      Creates a new role with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new role
      description - a description of the role
      Returns:
      true if the role was created successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteRole

      boolean deleteRole(String name)
      Deletes a role by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the role to delete
      Returns:
      true if the role was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • findRoleByName

      Role findRoleByName(String name)
      Finds a role by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the role to find
      Returns:
      the Role object if found, or null if not found

    • assignRoleToUser

      Boolean assignRoleToUser(String username, String role)
      Assigns a role to a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to assign the role to
      role - the name of the role to assign
      Returns:
      true if the role was assigned successfully, false otherwise

    • removeRoleFromUser

      Boolean removeRoleFromUser(String username, String role)
      Removes a role from a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      role - the name of the role to remove
      Returns:
      true if the role was removed successfully, false otherwise
